title: In Search Of The Desired Pastry
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hey, Kotori! Have you tried that one pastry that’s really popular right now!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>What kind of pastry?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You know, that round bread one that’s filled to the brim with cream! Uhh, what was it again? I’m not used to hearing the word, so I can’t remember....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>What may it be? It’s not cream buns.... is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah. Ah, one more thing, I heard that it has orange peels inside the cream.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah! That one! Kotori knows that one, but.... Uuuh, Kotori can’t remember the name either~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Me too! I know what it looks like, though!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Kotori knows what kind of bread it is too. Sometimes, there are also ones with strawberries in-between, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s it! Good, we might not know the name, but at least you know what it is. Do you know where they sell it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Oh, about that, there’s a new bakery that just opened. Let’s go there and buy some right now♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
